title: In my game im not logging on to Chat Service

replies.body:
Chat service login issues are usually a result of your connection dropping off before reaching the chat servers. If this is still happening to you, I recommend ensuring your local network settings are compatible with our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step.

Let me know if your issue persists.
